name: Potion Perry's Alchemy Adventure
description:
Adventure game centered around brewing potions combining TWO different ingredients!

Theme: TWO

Built for 2020 United Game Jam

Play as Potion Perry as he tries to find the last ingredient for his potion of immortality. Brew potions combining TWO ingredients, hold TWO potions at a time and fight with your TWO fists if it comes down to it! survive and find the final ingredient to win!

Built By: masea3439 and solarpanel

Game uses: 

  • 16x16 Dungeon Tile Set
  • Royalty Free Music
  • Pixel Art Text Generator
